eg.projects

Class AbstractProject

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.projects.AbstractProject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HtmlProject, JavaProject, PerlProject

    public abstract class AbstractProject
extends java.lang.Object
implements Configurable
    The configuration of a project.

    This class works in combination with an object of SettingsWindow where values required for a configuration are entered.

    Parameters that describe the configuration of a project are stored in the "prefs.properties" file in the program folder and optionally in an "eadproject.properies" file that is stored in the root folder of a project.

    • Method Detail

      • buildSettingsWindow

        public void buildSettingsWindow()
        Builds the content of the settings window.

        The window shows the text field to enter the name of the presumed root directory of the project. An overriding method may use this SettingsWindow.InputOptionsBuilder to build a window with additional input options but must not call super.buildSettingsWindow()

        Specified by:
        buildSettingsWindow in interface Configurable

        public final boolean configureProject(java.lang.String dir)

        Returns if a project can be successfully configured based on the entries in this settings window and the specified directory
        Specified by:
        configureProject in interface Configurable
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory that may be or be contained in the presumed root directory of the project
        Returns:
        the boolean value that is true if the project could be configured

      • retrieveProject

        public final boolean retrieveProject(java.lang.String dir)
        Returns if a project stored in a preferences file can be retrieved based on the specified directory.

        First it is tried to find an "eadproject" file in dir or further upward the directory path and, if this is not found, it is tested if dir is contained in the recent project saved in the "prefs" file in the program folder.

        Specified by:
        retrieveProject in interface Configurable
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory that may be or be contained in the presumed root directory of the project
        Returns:
        the boolean value that is true if a saved project could be retrieved

        protected java.lang.String getNamespace()
        Returns the namespace of the main file. This is a relative directory or directory path based at the sources directory or, if a sources directory is not given, at the project's root directory.
        Returns:
        the namespace. The empty string if no namespace is given
